args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The multiplicative groups of nonzero real and complex numbers are not isomorphic. -/
theorem real_units_not_isomorphic_complex_units :
  ¬ Nonempty (Units ℝ ≃* Units ℂ) := by sorry
